original_text: Anyone who still thinks like a baby does not yet understand God's message about what is right. It is as if they are still drinking only milk.
korean_text: 이는 젖을 먹는 자마다 어린 아이니 의의 말씀을 경험하지 못한 자요

sentences.original_text: Anyone who still thinks like a baby
does not yet understand God's message
It is as if they are still drinking only milk
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 마치 아직 우유만 마시는 것과 같습니다
